phrases: You are really getting the hang of this, Sora
You have got the eyes of a fish that is been rotting in the sun!
Nyapollon's not finished yet, so I have been pulling all-nighters.
I have a quota to meet at the chocolate banana cafe, too.
You should have a banana, too.
I will work hard enough for both of us.
You can go to Nyapollon's prep room.
I do not have anything to do on Nyapollon right now,
so at least let me help you out.
You could have at least told me it looked good on me.
Bring us a ton of customers!
I am going to make loads of these!
I wish I could just shut down all culture festivals...
where I do not get to run around with girls.
Jin-san, you were that excited about all this?
appear all over the school during a culture festival.
some really thrilling play becomes possible.
I have never experienced anything more thrilling than this.
Four days until opening, and I have got even more...
blocking to do for the drama sequences.
It is so thrilling, I wish I could just pass out.
I feel the same way, but the demon...
who will not allow that is about to show up.
No one's sleeping on the job in here, are they?!
It is a potion to restore your hit points!
It says it will guide us beyond our limits.
Yeah, I guess it is still too early to exceed our limits.
Okay then, let us wake ourselves up...
Mashiron's wearing a cat girl suit for this year's art exhibit.
You make it sound like she is a monster, but that is not right, is it?
It is the cat version of a bunny girl suit, right?
Mashiron's so cute, it made my nose run.
It gave you a nosebleed, you mean...
I bet it looks good on her...
This is the Forest Exhibition, Etc.
This is the Forest Exhibition, Etc.
That is not what that means.
According to Misaki, it combines an exhibit, a cafe, caricatures,
the forest, omelet rice, and animal suits.
The etc. carries too much weight.
This was handcrafted by a forest bear!
We will draw your face on it in ketchup for free!
You are fighting me for this job?!
You are standing too close, Senpai!
We are never too close nor too far away!
You draw the caricature right on the face?
What are you, a rebel without a because?
Sorry, Senpai, but I choose Shiina.
I lost the battle between women!
You have got such a delicate touch.
This is not a caricature, it is a portrait...
There is such a thing as cannibalism.
You did this out of spite, did not you?
If you are finished eating, let us get back to work.
Mashiron, your shift's over too, is not it?
Then, let us all go back together.
You are coming dressed like that?!
You are the one who is got something wrong!
Why are you wearing a cat's skin over your birthday suit?
As good as panties are, they are not the solution to every problem...
If you are so interested in the culture festival,
you should have gone to work in the prep room.
Why are you in my room, anyway?
Because you interest me even more than the culture festival, Ryunosuke.
If you would be willing to go with me
How could I go to a culture festival swarming with girls?
Why do you hate women so much?
Do not come any closer, freeloader!
Do not accentuate your cleavage more than necessary!
Then, stop looking up at me like that!
First, you chide me for my fake smiles,
and now, you are rejecting the expression of my eyes?
I would heard that Japanese gentlemen were bossy...
and I guess it was true.
I will exterminate you right now!
If you can do it from there, go ahead.
I will get you one day!
We are going to add some lines.
The only thing I can do is cook dinner.
Does not look like it will stain.
I will go wash my face...
I mean, you forgot to put up the sign...
saying you were using the bathroom!
That is because I was not planning on taking my clothes off...
Did you lose a kilogram when you took off your clothes?
There is an urban legend saying you weigh less...
if you stand on one leg.
The flight departs on the last day of the festival.
That was Mashiro's father in England.
Mashiro has people waiting for her.
Mashiro will return to where she belongs.
Do you want to take a look around the festival?
When it is just the two of us, call me Mashiro.
Is there anything you are not telling me?
YOU-Um, there is something I would like to ask you about the exhibit!
I will be waiting in the prep room.
Mashiro has people waiting for her.
Mashiro will return to where she belongs.
Akasaka, why are you dressed like that?!
When I arrived at school, a salesgirl...
with a ponytail forced me to wear it.
I promised him he could just stand there if he did it.
I did not think you would come to the culture festival.
I did not have any choice.
Ever since that woman took over my room,
I have not been able to sleep!
He is getting a lot of customers.
We should be grateful to Rita-san.
Kanda, come check the climax with me.
It is the final battle with Ein the Hunchback.
There are two synchronized controls during the battle.
By lifting and lowering their hands,
Once they are backed into a corner,
the audience has to clap their hands.
Once it senses a set volume,
Nyapollon will use her finishing move.
You will be the one who revs up the crowd, ponytail.
It feels like there is something missing...
Just having them shout the name...
of the attack feels like a waste of the system.
We can manage to just barely change the program in time,
but we do not have time to order additional animation.
What is your idea to use the system effectively?
I did not have an idea in mind.
A director has to be prepared when he suggests a change.
Why are you just standing there?
A director who loses his way just before...
the development deadline only creates confusion.
Hey, Akasaka-kun, you are going too far again...
We are running out of time, but I guess there is no choice.
You should really go think about your responsibilities.
Special Lecture by Graduate Fujisawa Kazuki For Anyone Aiming to Become a Creator Discussing the Future of Video Games
People often ask me how to become a creator.
But I believe the impulse or desire...
to create something comes from within...
and is not something that can be taught.
To create a product that appeals...
to the emotions of more users,
If you do not move your own heart,
you cannot move the hearts of others.
Creating a product that moves your heart...
Nyapollon is not what is in my heart right now.
I came to pick you up.
Ryunosuke said you would be here.
Jin and Misaki are over there.
They are having an intimate moment.
High's culture festival is so lively.
Is not it about time you told me why you came to see me?
Do I have to answer that?
After all, you did not answer me before.
I am nothing more than a substitute for Misaki to you.
You are afraid to hurt Misaki.
You want to keep her by your side, pure and untouched, forever.
Is not that why you are with me instead?
At least think up a cover story.
My feelings for you were genuine.
Do you even know what intimate means?
She is my older sister and...
But maybe I will believe you.
Why do not we give it another shot?
We have both grown up a bit since then.
I have no intention of doing that.
If you answer me so seriously, I am the one who will be embarrassed.
I hear you are going to college in Osaka.
Yeah, their literary department is more substantial than Suimei's.
I knew, but I could not tell you...
He said he did not want to give Fuuka-chan another chance.
I figured Jin just had not gotten over Fuuka-chan.
But that means I have a chance, too, does not it?
First, I will make Nyapollon a success!
I will make this Jin's favorite memory, and that goes for everyone else, too!
Oh, by the way, kouhai-kun, what did you know?
That Jin-san was going to college in Osaka...
Oh yeah, he did say something like that.
You will not get to see him every day anymore.
Kouhai-kun, do not underestimate modern society!
Osaka's only two and a half hours away by bullet train.
It is even faster by plane.
Senpai, do you have any concept of time, space or money?
That does not matter, as long as you really want to see them!
It is all about that irrepressible impulse!
It is time to exceed our limits!
The timing for the switch over to this 3D part...
I know what you mean, so do not get so close.
Making the best memory with Nyapollon...
Is it really okay if all we do is make memories?
Is it okay for me to let Shiina go back to England?
In order to create a product that appeals...
to the emotions of more users,
As long as you really want to see them!
It is all about that irrepressible impulse!
wrote her emotions into her manga...
Misaki-senpai, do you have a minute?
It is about the climax of Nyapollon...
I want to add an impulse!
I want to add an impulse to Milky Way Cat Nyapollon!! by Kouhai-kun!
The final battle between Nyapollon and Ein the Hunchback.
The system measures the volume of the audience's cheers...
but I want to use an additional value.
I want to give Nyapollon an energy gauge...
and empty it once before the final battle.
Then, we will have the audience shout out the feelings...
they most want to convey to someone.
They can shout whatever they want.
It is fine if people declare their love,
and it is fine if they just make a simple complaint.
and once the gauge is full,
it sets off the meatball beam.
I can change the program in two hours.
Let us get this battle started!
What am I supposed to do here?!
It is time to exceed our limits!
In these few remaining hours, we can...
Let us get ready for the show by sleeping!
Once the festival's over, Shiina will...
I want you to stay with me until I fall asleep.
I am starting to get nervous about Nyapollon!
They say to eat three people, right?
These lame jokes just are not me!
